00307 void Text::divideStrings(char delimiter)
00308 {
00309         int pos=0, spos=0;
00310         int idx=1;
00311         size_t lc=0;
00312 
00313         if(m_pstrex!=0) delete [] m_pstrex;
00314 
00315         while((pos=this->getIndex(pos, delimiter))>=0)
00316         {
00317                 pos = pos + idx;
00318                 lc++;
00319         }
00320 
00321 /*
00322         if(lc==0)
00323         {
00324                 m_status=0;
00325                 return ;
00326         }
00327 */
00328         lc++;
00329         
00330         if((m_pstrex=new StringEx[lc])==0)
00331         {
00332                 m_status = -1;
00333                 return ;
00334         }       
00335 
00336         m_num = lc;
00337 
00338         for(size_t i=0; i<lc; i++)
00339         {
00340                 pos=this->getIndex(spos, delimiter);
00341                 StringEx strex;
00342 
00343                 if(pos<0) strex = this->getSubString(spos, this->getLength());
00344                 else strex = this->getSubString(spos, pos);
00345 
00346                 m_pstrex[i]=strex;
00347 
00348                 spos=pos+idx;
00349         }
00350 
00351         m_status=1;
00352 
00353         return ;        
00354 }

00356 void Text::divideStrings(char* delimiter)
00357 {
00358         int pos=0, spos=0;
00359         size_t idx=(size_t)strlen(delimiter);
00360         size_t lc=0;
00361 
00362         if(m_pstrex!=0) delete [] m_pstrex;
00363         if(idx==0) return ;
00364 
00365         while((pos=this->getIndex(pos, delimiter))>=0)
00366         {
00367                 pos = pos + static_cast<int>(idx);
00368                 lc++;
00369         }
00370 /*              added on at 2005.03.15
00371         if(lc==0)
00372         {
00373                 m_status=0;
00374                 return ;
00375         }
00376 */
00377         lc++;
00378         
00379         if((m_pstrex=new StringEx[lc])==0)
00380         {
00381                 m_status = -1;
00382                 return ;
00383         }       
00384 
00385         m_num = lc;
00386 
00387         for(size_t i=0; i<lc; i++)
00388         {
00389                 pos=this->getIndex(spos, delimiter);

00391 
00392                 if(pos<0) strex = this->getSubString(spos, this->getLength());

00394

00399

00456 //      아래 세개의 함수는 원문을 변형한다. (delimiter 위치에 '\0' 삽입)

00460 #define DEFAULT_divide_MAX      10
00461 
00462 void Text::divideStringsPtr(char delimiter)
00463 {
00464         size_t lc=0;
00465         size_t times =1;
00466 
00467         if( string::empty() ) return ;
00468 
00469         if( m_pstr!=0 )
00470         {
00471                 delete [] m_pstr;
00472                 m_num = 0;
00473         }
00474 
00475         m_pstr = new char*[DEFAULT_divide_MAX* times];
00476 
00477         char* ppos;
00478         char* pspos = const_cast<char*>(string::data());
00479 
00480         m_pstr[lc++] = pspos;
00481 
00482         while( (ppos=strchr( pspos, delimiter )) != 0 )
00483         {
00484                 if( lc >= DEFAULT_divide_MAX* times )
00485                 {
00486                         times++;
00487                         char** pstr = new char*[DEFAULT_divide_MAX * times];
00488 
00489                         for( size_t i=0; i<lc; i++ ) pstr[i] = m_pstr[i];
00490 
00491                         delete [] m_pstr;
00492                         m_pstr = pstr;
00493                 }
00494 
00495                 *ppos = '\0';           
00496                 pspos = ppos + 1;
00497                 m_pstr[lc++] = pspos;
00498         }
00499 
00500         m_num = lc;
00501 
00502         m_status = 1;
00503 
00504         return ;        
00505 }
00506 
00507 void Text::divideStringsPtr(char* delimiter)
00508 {
00509         size_t lc=0;
00510         size_t times =1;
00511 
00512         if( string::empty() ) return ;
00513 
00514         if( m_pstr!=0 )
00515         {
00516                 delete [] m_pstr;
00517                 m_num = 0;
00518         }
00519 
00520         m_pstr = new char* [DEFAULT_divide_MAX * times];
00521 
00522         char* ppos;
00523         char* pspos = const_cast<char*>(string::data());
00524         size_t len = strlen(delimiter);
00525 
00526         m_pstr[lc++] = pspos;
00527 
00528         while( (ppos=strstr( pspos, delimiter )) != 0 )
00529         {
00530                 if( lc >= DEFAULT_divide_MAX* times )
00531                 {
00532                         times++;
00533                         char** pstr = new char*[DEFAULT_divide_MAX * times];
00534 
00535                         for( size_t i=0; i<lc; i++ ) pstr[i] = m_pstr[i];
00536 
00537                         delete [] m_pstr;
00538                         m_pstr = pstr;
00539                 }
00540 
00541                 *ppos = '\0';           
00542                 pspos = ppos + len;
00543                 m_pstr[lc++] = pspos;
00544         }
00545 
00546         m_num = lc;
00547 
00548         m_status = 1;
00549 
00550         return ;
00551 }

00553 char* Text::strChrs( char* pspos, char* delimiters)
00554 {
00555         size_t len = strlen(delimiters);
00556 
00557         for(size_t i=0; i<len; i++)
00558         {
00559                 char* ppos = strchr( pspos, delimiters[i] );
00560 
00561                 if( ppos != 0 ) return ppos;
00562         }
00563 
00564         return 0;
00565 }

00567 void Text::divideStrings2Ptr(char* delimiters)
00568 {
00569         size_t lc=0;
00570         size_t times =1;
00571 
00572         if( string::empty() ) return ;
00573 
00574         if( m_pstr!=0 )
00575         {
00576                 delete [] m_pstr;

00578         }

00584

00588         {

00590                 {

00612 StringEx Text::getStringBetweenAnB(char* A, char* B, int isIncluded)
00613 {
00614         size_t Apos=0, Bpos=0, spos=0;
00615         size_t len_A, len_B, n=0;
00616         StringEx strex;
00617 
00618         len_A=(size_t)strlen(A); len_B=(size_t)strlen(B);
00619         if((Apos=this->getIndex(spos, A))<0 || (Bpos=this->getIndex(Apos+len_A, B))<0)
00620         {
00621                 m_status=0;
00622                 return strex;
00623         }
00624         if(len_A==0 || len_B==0 || Apos>=Bpos || Apos+len_A>=Bpos)
00625         {
00626                 m_status=0;
00627                 return strex;
00628         }
00629 
00630         if(isIncluded==1)
00631         {
00632                 n=Bpos+len_B - Apos;
00633                 spos=Apos;
00634         }
00635         else
00636         {
00637                 n=Bpos - (Apos+len_A);
00638                 spos=Apos+len_A;
00639         }
00640 
00641         strex = this->getSubString(spos, spos+n);
00642 
00643         m_pos = static_cast<int>(spos + n);
00644 
00645         m_status=1;
00646 
00647         return strex;
00648 }
00649 
00650 StringEx Text::getStringBetweenAnB(int pos, char* A, char* B, int isIncluded)
00651 {
00652         size_t Apos=0, Bpos=0, spos=pos;
00653         size_t len_A, len_B, n=0;
00654         StringEx strex;
00655 
00656         len_A=(size_t)strlen(A); len_B=(size_t)strlen(B);
00657         if((Apos=this->getIndex(spos, A))<0 || (Bpos=this->getIndex(Apos+len_A, B))<0)
00658         {
00659                 m_status=0;
00660                 return strex;
00661         }
00662         if(len_A==0 || len_B==0 || Apos>=Bpos || Apos+len_A>=Bpos)
00663         {
00664                 m_status=0;
00665                 return strex;
00666         }
00667 
00668         if(isIncluded==1)
00669         {
00670                 n=Bpos+len_B - Apos;
00671                 spos=Apos;
00672         }
00673         else
00674         {
00675                 n=Bpos - (Apos+len_A);
00676                 spos=Apos+len_A;
00677         }
00678 
00679         strex = this->getSubString(spos, spos+n);
00680 
00681         m_pos = static_cast<int>(spos + n);
00682 
00683         m_status=1;
00684 
00685         return strex;
00686 }
00687 
00688 #define GROWINGSIZE     50
00689 
00690 void Text::getStringsBetweenAnBs(char* A, char* B, int isIncluded)
00691 {
00692         int pos=0;
00693         StringEx *pstrex=0;
00694         size_t lc=0, i;
00695 
00696         if(m_pstrex!=0) delete [] m_pstrex;
00697 
00698         while(1)
00699         {
00700                 StringEx strex=getStringBetweenAnB(pos, A, B, isIncluded);
00701                 if(m_status<=0) break;
00702 
00703 
00704                 if((lc % GROWINGSIZE)==0)
00705                 {
00706                         if((pstrex = new StringEx[lc + GROWINGSIZE])==0)
00707                         {
00708                                 m_status=-1;                            
00709                                 return ;
00710                         }
00711 
00712                         for(i=0; i<lc; i++)
00713                         {
00714                                 pstrex[i] = m_pstrex[i];                                
00715                         }
00716         
00717                         delete [] m_pstrex;
00718 
00719                         m_pstrex = pstrex;
00720                 }
00721 
00722                 pstrex[lc++] = strex;
00723                 pos=m_pos;
00724                 m_num = lc;
00725         }
00726 
00727         return ;
00728 }
